This is what i did on my galaxy note.

DL this torrent and install the .apk on your phone. 

1. DL the sd file on the link given on the Read me file which is included on this torrent.

2. unzip or unrar the file which will have a file name of 
"com.gameloft.android.ANMP.GloftAMHM.rar".

3. you will now get a file called "main.108.com.gameloft.android.ANMP.GloftAMHM.obb"

4. on that file, Right click on it and click "open with"... then look for the winrar.exe or winzip.exe. if you can't find then browse your program files.

5. Extract. After extracting copy all the files to " sd/android/data/com.gameloft.android.ANMP.GloftAMHM/files/"

Then it should work.
